reviews.review: #1 game you must play. the foundation for gaming. It is great and fun to play over and over.

Just recently came back to this after my best friend started playing it. I still remember all of the physics puzzles and the game itself is still so cool, so much nostalgia for both HL and HL2. I wish more games could do what HL2 did for me and now my friend.

Un muy buen juego con una gran jugabilidad, sin si quiera mencionar su gran historia, la cual no es sorpresa para nadie, se encuentra incompleta y con una historia con muchas dudas, con necesidad de una nueva secuela.
A really great story and great gameplay, especially for a 15 year old game.

one of the most og games ever, a must own game

Overall rating 9/10

Breakdown

Visuals-Still pretty good for 2019 particularly character faces and expressions. Just finished playing the game again, probably the fifth time now, and I'm still really impressed with how expressive the character faces are.

Music-Incredibly good, one thing that I've noticed about Valve games is that they always have really good music that sets the mood. I played a lot of video games, but I believe Half-Life two has one of the best soundtracks of them all.

Gameplay-Really fun, combat is fast-paced, levels are challenging, but not infuriatingly so. Controls are very tight except for perhaps the vehicles which are a little clunky, but still fun.

Story-This game has a very compelling and interesting story that is well written.

Recommendation-Can't recommend this game enough!

Che gordo, sacame el 3 de onda. Tipo me re canse de esperar para matar a G-Man osea, el loco te re cancherea en todos los juegos, te aparece y encima atras de un vidrio que ni se rompe cosa que no le podes disparar, loco, me lo quiero culear a tiros, saca el 3. Dale gordo vos podes, media pila.

Honestly, Half-Life 2 is an amazing sequel to the already amazing Half-Life. The gameplay and story still holds up well to this day, i can't recommend this game enough.

One of my favorite games ever, only second to the original. The world - as well as the physics puzzles, combat, and general feel of the gameplay - are just riveting. It's certainly a must-play for anyone who enjoys FPS titles.
un juego de culto demasiado bueno que le sirve tanto a un jugador casual como a uno empedernido, me encanta.
Timeless Masterpiece, very good engine and wonderful story. Has aged really really well
Одна из лучших игр в которые я играл! И помните если кто-то сказал что "Half-life 2 GOVNO". То скажите ему цитатой Барни! "Что б шёл нахрен!"
A classic for sure. If you're into any fps games at all, this is a must play.

This game is great. The story is really good and the way that it was designed is just perfect. The game tells you how to play without the need of tutorials. 

I totally recommend this game.

A pesar de que Half Life 2 ya es un juego que salió algunos años, puedo decir que su historia y trama es muy buena y me sigue atrapando. Recomiendo jugar este juego si realmente te gustan los tipos de juegos de disparos en primera persona y que en su historia contenga ciencia ficción.

Considero que Half Life 2 fue un juego muy avanzado para su época, solo espero que Valve saque Half Life 3 y continúe con esta saga que es muy buena.
